subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador tested positive for clenbuterol — a muscle-building and weight-loss drug — on July 21. He denies doping and blames contaminated beef he had eaten.
snippet: Alberto Contador tested positive for clenbuterol — a muscle-building and weight-loss drug — on July 21. He denies doping and blames contaminated beef he had eaten.
